bill_title: prohibit hunting on certain railroad rights-of-way.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit hunting on certain railroad rights-of-way. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 41-9 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No person may hunt on any railroad right-of-way that is owned or leased by the state or by any private railroad. A violation of this section is a Class 2 misdemeanor. 450 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
